sentence.Network_en: Here we outline some of the some-times conflicting forces moulding the debate.
sentence.Network_cn: 在此我们概述一些有时影响争论的相互对立的力量。

sentence.Network_en: There are conflicting reports about the identity of the hostage.
sentence.Network_cn: 有关人质身份的报道相互矛盾。

sentence.Network_en: Another team of scientists has come up with conflicting evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 另一组科学家提出了有抵触的证据.

词源: fligere(L.), to strike or dash down 击倒conflicting a. 相反的flor flower

list.abs: 我采用了文化冲突(cultural conflict)的观点来看台湾九年一贯课程改革下的教师话语(teacher discourse)，目的在找出课程实践的困难，.
项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Conflict 冲突 Conflict Management 冲突管理 Conflict Resolution 冲突解决方案.
公司部门英文缩写简称大全(1) - Lixy - 博客园 ... 紧张:( stress) 角色冲突:( role conflict) 催眠法:( hypnosis).
西方的冲突理论（conflict theory）认为，社会总处于不断变化的冲突之中，社会生活的基本条件不是协调，而是不同的行为主体围绕 …

entry.def: Conflict is serious disagreement and argument about something important. If two people or groups are in conflict, they have had a serious disagreement or argument and have not yet reached agreement.

example.ex: Try to keep any conflict between you and your ex-partner to a minimum...
example.tran: 尽量将自己与前配偶之间的摩擦减到最小。

example.ex: Employees already are in conflict with management over job cuts...
example.tran: 雇员已经就裁员一事与管理层发生了争执。

entry.def: Conflict is a state of mind in which you find it impossible to make a decision.

example.ex: ...the anguish of his own inner conflict.
example.tran: 内心矛盾给他带来的极大痛苦

entry.def: Conflict is fighting between countries or groups of people.

example.ex: ...talks aimed at ending four decades of conflict...
example.tran: 旨在结束持续了40年的冲突的会谈

example.ex: The National Security Council has met to discuss ways of preventing a military conflict.
example.tran: 国家安全委员会开会讨论防止发生军事冲突的办法。

entry.tran: (信仰、观念或利益之间的)严重分歧，冲突
entry.def: A conflict is a serious difference between two or more beliefs, ideas, or interests. If two beliefs, ideas, or interests are in conflict, they are very different.

example.ex: There is a conflict between what they are doing and what you want...
example.tran: 他们所做的与你想要的之间存在冲突。

example.ex: Do you feel any conflict of loyalties?...
example.tran: 有没有觉得两面效忠存在冲突？

entry.tran: (想法、信仰或陈述)冲突，抵触，相互矛盾
entry.def: If ideas, beliefs, or accounts conflict, they are very different from each other and it seems impossible for them to exist together or to each be true.

example.ex: Personal ethics and professional ethics sometimes conflict...
example.tran: 个人道德和职业道德有时会相互抵触。

example.ex: He held firm opinions which usually conflicted with my own...
example.tran: 他所持的观点通常与我的相左，而且很难改变。

sentences.sentence: "the figures are at odds with our findings"
"contradictory attributes of unjust justice and loving vindictiveness"- John Morley
"they were usually at odds over politics"

auth_sentence.content: So you have conflicting requirements for the two motors.
auth_sentence.res_content: So you have conflicting requirements for the two motors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So you have conflicting requirements for the two motors.

auth_sentence.content: He said the conflicting interests are at times irreconcilable.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said the conflicting interests are at times irreconcilable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said the conflicting interests are at times irreconcilable.

auth_sentence.content: But our experience of conflicting surveys left us confused.
auth_sentence.res_content: But our experience of conflicting surveys left us confused.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But our experience of conflicting surveys left us confused.

sentences.en: A thousand conflicting thoughts rushed through his mind.
sentences.cn: 千百种矛盾的思想从他脑中掠过。

sentences.en: Another team of scientists has come up with conflicting evidence.
sentences.cn: 另一组科学家提出了有抵触的证据。
